steps.name: $("by text: Add New Category") should be(clickable: interactable and enabled)
$("html > body > vaadin-app-layout > vaadin-vertical-layout > iron-list > span:nth-of-type(12) > flow-component-renderer > vaadin-horizontal-layout") should have(text "Teste")
